original_text: And he shall put some of the blood upon the horns of the altar which is before the Lord, that is in the tabernacle of the congregation, and shall pour out all the blood at the bottom of the altar of the burnt offering, which is at the door of the tabernacle of the congregation.
korean_text: 또 그 피로 회막 안 여호와 앞에 있는 제단 뿔들에 바르고 그 피 전부는 회막 문 앞 번제단 밑에 쏟을 것이며

sentences.original_text: And he shall put some of the blood
upon the horns of the altar
that is in the tabernacle of the congregation
and shall pour out all the blood
at the bottom of the altar of the burnt offering
which is at the door of the tabernacle of the congregation
